channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large suitcase dumped on pavement, 11th July
item.description:
Suitcase dumped on pavement for several days and side road in Grosvenor road had a large pile of dumped clothing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Grosvenor Road, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish left on footpath, 11th July
item.description:
The occupants of number 12 invermore place keep putting there rubbish against the wall, when the they recycling bins in there garden i have told them that there is a big recycling bin by the car park but they just ignore my comments and but the rubbish there anyway this has been going for some time now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ivermore Place, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole growing in size in road outside 46 Clock House Road., 11th July
item.description:
The pot hole in the middle of Clock House Road, outside number 46, is growing in size and is a danger to the many cyclists who use the road. (Large groups of them pass this spot especially at weekends) As a sink hole is at present waiting for repair a few doors away we hope this may be an opportunity for the same road crew to fill in this nearby pot hole to prevent it getting even bigger.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clock House Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 11th July
item.description:
There is a blocked drain in the alleyway between house numbers 11 and 13, Charlesfield, SE9 4NX. The blockage needs urgent attention to prevent future flooding and damage to nearby properties, including mine. Please send someone to inspect and fix this as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlesfield, Chinbrook, London
